resources.string: DSUSA stands for "Dixie State University Student Association," colloquially known as the student government.\nWe do everything from planning parties to representing students on the Academic Integrity Committee

Student Life:
This branch plans all of the parties

Academic Senate:
Sponsors student academic interests and Student of the Semester

Service:
Sponsors and staffs service projects in the community

Clubs:
Charters, pays for, and manages Dixie clubs

Public Relations:
Gets people to the events put on by the other branches
